tooltip.enchantment-exploration.main.ena: Enables or disables all features of the mod.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.cost0: The cost of the first enchantment level.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.cost1: The cost of the second enchantment level.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.cost2: The cost of the third enchantment level.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.to: Toggles if you can combine items with tools in an anvil.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.bo: Toggles if you can combine items with enchantment book in an anvil.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.va: Toggles if the default repair materials will repair items, or only those in this list.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.cu: Additional materials that will repair their specified items.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.loot-tab: When generating a loot table, a normal enchanted book (those naturally occuring in vanilla) will not generate with these enchantments. If no viable enchantments are found, the enchanted book will not be generated.
Loot tables that will ignore the enchantment skips. Useful for modded loot tables where vanilla enchanted books are wanted.

A set of primary loot table, to secondary loot tables to pull an enchanted book from. The first is the loot pool being generated, the second is the pool to pull from. Every time loot is generated, there is always a pull from the second loot table. No Enchantments are skipped during this pull. CURRENTLY DOES NOT SUPPORT LOOT TABLE ENTRIES
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.sk: Should be formatted: <primary loot table>;<secondary loot table>
